title: OPL Viewing Party: Sydney Summoners Society & First Round Esports Bar
body:
Summoners’ Society & First Round Finals Viewing party
During this event there will be 1 v 1 tournament to play in, lots of fun games and door prizes to be won! If you come in cosplay, any current OPL team’s Merch or Summoners’ Society merch you will get buy one get one free drink.

Details 
Date: 6th April
Times: 2pm till Late 
Address: 1 The Esplanade, Ashfield NSW 2131 

Food Special 
$15 for a pizza and a soda

Tournament 1 v 1 
Sign up at the bar between 2pm-2:30pm 
Games start at 2:30pm runs till game 

Door Prize
Win 1 out 3 league of legends pack (Full of league of legends swag) 

Who will win?
At 4pm will take bets on who you believe will win. The winner will receive a $10 RP card. 

Flip the Coin: During the desk segment 
Ezreal (tails) and Karthus (Head) Ult poses 
Winner will receive a small prize. 

Best Cosplay
Giving out a small prize the best dress cosplayer
